html:
8.2.22  7:16 pm   What happens when you put on rough clothes? Does that make you feel soft or is it just too much rough

      i have never put on rough clothes

8.2.22  7:11 pm   How do I get my cat to walk me?

      give the cat some treats

8.2.22  7:01 pm   is "meet me in september" about SCP-5243?

      no

8.2.22  6:51 pm   I've noticed that some songs' titles appear in the lyrics to of other songs (such as the line "home again" appearing in 987, "do what you want to do" appearing in we could just get high, etc.) Are these intentional references to your other songs or just coincidences?

      neither. the english language surely has a finite amount of words and phrases available. even fewer if you only consider 'normal' phrases. which i use exclusively for my music, as part of the normal genre

8.2.22  6:36 pm   hi bill! your music is awesome, thank you for putting all the effort into making it :D
who is your favorite music artist?

      i have mixed feelings about all of them

8.2.22  6:24 pm   What is the jazz category for?

      those times when i want to just jam out on some existing song forms

8.2.22  6:19 pm   how do you deal with words

      every possible way. keep finding new ways

8.2.22  5:56 pm   What's your opinion on wearing mismatched socks?

      this is healthy, as long as they feel the same

8.2.22  5:53 pm   How do you come up with your song ideas?

      i don't know

8.2.22  5:51 pm   did you write "i like to wear soft clothing..." with the concepts of self perception and validation and others' perceptions of yourself in mind?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

8.2.22  5:43 pm   whats a good way to transition from one key to some waaay other random key?

      by the time you know it's happening you should have already done it. ideally, when composing music, the subconscious is driving the bus

8.2.22  5:39 pm   how often do you get questions that are very much not appropriate to answer?

      none of the questions are appropriate to answer

8.2.22  5:33 pm   how much key changes are in your next song?

      i have no idea

8.2.22  5:19 pm   what is your process for writing lyrics?

      i'm not sure, but the music is right there too. so there's almost no scenario where i'm writing only lyrics. the process for writing music in general is mysterious to me. it's ideally the same as dreaming, but the problem with being asleep is it's difficult to organize and save your ideas, and when you're awake it's hard to dream as vividly or authentically

8.2.22  5:18 pm   Are you happy?

      yes and no

8.2.22  4:58 pm   how rough do you feel as a result of your soft clothing in comparison to your usual feelings of roughness (if at all)?

      the whole thing is hypothetical. i feel neither soft nor rough

8.2.22  4:58 pm   your newest video is crazy and crazy, each one in the past year has been so radically different and cooler than the last; what have you learned from experimenting with so many styles??

      it's healthy. i assume one day i will find my way to what is considered the correct video

8.2.22  4:55 pm   what inspired you to put a cat in your latest video

      there was a cat in the song

8.2.22  4:54 pm   Greatest fear?

      greatness

8.2.22  4:52 pm   why'd you decide to make "tune" an Eb instead of D 

      that's just how it goes. thinking about it now as D and that sounds ugly as heck to me. i suppose if you move the "it's" (or "we'll") note earlier in your mind, you'll hear the sus4 resolve and the descending melody line. hope that helps

8.2.22  4:51 pm   best way to cook an egg?

      install it directly into the center of the sun

8.2.22  4:48 pm   i find a lot of meaning in your music. what if that meaning is not the same meaning you had when you were writing it?

      i already know and expect this

8.2.22  4:45 pm   Favorite italian noodle?

      elbow

8.2.22  4:45 pm   how long on average per day do you spend staring blankly at your computer screen while it is turned off

      0 minutes

8.2.22  4:42 pm   Your new music video makes me think you went on a lovely adventure through the effects tab of your editing software, is my intuition correct

      no. most of the important effects in that video i programmed myself, because i do not make the videos on video editing software per se

8.2.22  4:40 pm   any advice on writing poetry? I've been having a really tough time

      try bad poetry, for a while

8.2.22  4:38 pm   ever worn rough clothing?

     yes

      if so, thoughts?

      it wasn't as rough as i expected

8.2.22  4:34 pm   if my dog could play the guitar that would be cool right?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

8.2.22  4:32 pm   is fall your favorite season?

      no

8.2.22  4:28 pm   how do you feel after releasing a new song?

      fine

8.2.22  4:25 pm   Have you written a song about bugs

     almost

     and if not would you write one about them?

      all options are on the table

8.2.22  4:24 pm   do you like to wear hard clothing?

      almost

8.2.22  4:22 pm   what's your favourite song?

      i don't know any songs

8.2.22  4:17 pm   How do you think of songs to make?

      sometimes they think of me

8.2.22  3:14 pm   WHATS ur opinion on emoticons

      they probably won't work as expected, unless you happen to be communicating with someone in the exact same time period as you, on the same brand of device

8.2.22  2:02 pm   how do you stop caring so much about every single person that all your social wires get tangled and you get scared? how do you keep personhood when there are so many people and you want them to like you? i want to make art and show myself to people too, but it's hard for some reason

      put all of that mental energy into the art

8.2.22  1:35 pm   do you have an opinion concerning the word "no"?

      it's good

8.2.22  12:05 pm   Where am i?

      right here

8.2.22  11:41 am   how many airport terminals have you been in?

      maybe 20

8.2.22  10:13 am   What is your favorite song/video you have made?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

8.2.22  9:07 am   if im good at music should i be confident about it or should i stare at the endless void questioning my sanity

      there's plenty of time to do both

8.2.22  7:55 am   Is language intelligence

      yes

8.2.22  6:43 am   am i crazy or is yyyymmddhhmmss the way ever

      that is great for organizational purposes because it alphabetizes correctly by default. however, in conversation, it can be harder because you might be burying the important part in the middle, especially if you are talking about short term time frames

8.2.22  5:39 am   bill what's your opinion on music from video games

      if you like the music, you're more likely to like the game. if you like the game, you're more likely to like the music. it's a vicious cycle

8.2.22  4:38 am   is this a good poem?
this is a good poem.
this is a good poem?
this is a poem, good.
a good poem this is!
is a poem THIS good:
"a! this,, poem %% good!! is"
is this a good poem!

      yes it is

8.2.22  3:03 am   what's the music that plays in the history of japan video at the "knock knock its the united states" part?

     i was calling it "the one where matthew perry makes some demands"

     I know you made it, but i'm not sure where to find it.

     i have never posted it

     also cool website

8.2.22  1:02 am   thoughts on the trombone?

      too big

8.1.22  11:22 pm   In an earlier question you said something about having a rough draft that you sing along to and then write the rest of the instruments on top, so i was wondering how much of that rough draft gets kept into the full song?

      the temp version that i sing over is usually removed entirely once the vocal is done

8.1.22  10:13 pm   which number do you dislike the most?

      179

8.1.22  8:27 pm   I know "I'm a huge ganer most of the time" came out months ago, and also a lot of events in your songs are fictitious, but I am curious... are there any games you genuinely enjoy? 

      guess what the other person is thinking
